dcterms:creator: E. Bursztein
dcterms:description: A dataset containing data from 45,000 Hearthstone games used to extract sequences of played cards and represent each record as a bag of card bi-grams for predicting opponent’s cards.
dcterms:title: Hearthstone games data (45,000 games)

dcterms:creator: A. Janusz
T. Tajmajer
M. ´Swiechowski
dcterms:description: Data from the AAIA’17 Data Mining Challenge focused on developing a scoring model for predicting win chances of a player based on detailed descriptions of game states.
dcterms:title: AAIA’17 Data Mining Challenge data

dcterms:creator: Ł. Grad
dcterms:description: A dataset with over 3.5 million samples from games played by strong MCTS bots, used for training neural networks to predict game outcomes.
dcterms:title: Dataset with over 3.5M samples from games played by strong MCTS bots

dcterms:description: An initial dataset consisting of randomly selected states and corresponding scores used for training models.
dcterms:title: Initial dataset consisting of randomly selected states and corresponding scores
